original_text: Get you up from among this congregation, that I may consume them as in a moment. And they fell upon their faces.
korean_text: 너희는 이 회중에게서 떠나라 내가 순식간에 그들을 멸하려 하노라 하시매 그 두 사람이 엎드리니라

sentences.original_text: Get you up from among this congregation,
that I may consume them as in a moment.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 순식간에 그들을 멸하게 하려 함이라.

sentences.original_text: And they fell upon their faces.
